thread.title: Nationals ace Scherzer to join Fox studio show during AL Championship Series
thread.title_full: Nationals ace Scherzer to join Fox studio show during AL Championship Series

author: News Staff
title: Nationals ace Scherzer to join Fox studio show during AL Championship Series
text:
by The Associated Press Posted Oct 14, 2015 6:43 pm EDT 
LOS ANGELES, Calif. – Washington Nationals ace Max Scherzer will join Fox’s studio show during the AL Championship Series. 
Scherzer earlier this month became only the sixth major league pitcher to throw two no-hitters in the same season. 
The network said Wednesday that he will join analysts Raul Ibanez, Pete Rose and Frank Thomas for pregame and postgame coverage starting with Friday’s Game 1.
